data.title: Demon Slayer Season 3: How Many Episodes and When Does It End?
data.meta_description: Here is how many episodes there are in Demon Slayer season 3. This is when the new Demon Slayer season on Crunchyroll will end.
data.meta_site_name: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
data.text:
Demon Slayer season 3 is well under way, with fans getting weekly releases of the hit anime series. However, there’s still a mystery of just how many episodes there are in season 3. Thankfully, we have an updated list and the latest end date information to help guide fans toward the fast-approaching finale.

How many episodes are in Demon Slayer season 3?

Demon Slayer season 3 is anticipated to have 11 episodes.

Someone’s Dream

Yoriichi Type Zero

A Sword from Over 300 Years Ago

Thank You, Tokito

Bright Red Sword

Aren’t You Going to Become a Hashira?

Awful Villain

The Mu in Muichiro

Mist Hashira Muchichiro Tokito

TBA

TBA

At the time of writing, reports suggest that Demon Slayer season 3 will be 11 episodes long. However, there is the possibility of an additional episode making for 12 in total.

Leaker @shonenleaks_ is one of several making claims about Demon Slayer season 3’s 11 episodes:

Demon Slayer season 3’s 11/12 episodes would make for the shortest season so far, considerably less than season 1’s 26 episodes and season 2’s 18 episodes.

Those fans who were expecting season 3 to incorporate the Hashira Training Arc will be disappointed to learn of the shorter length. However, it’s possible that this arc is planned for a second cour. This has yet to be confirmed, however.

When does Demon Slayer season 3 end?

Demon Slayer season 3 is anticipated to end on June 18.

The Demon Slayer season 3 finale is expected for June 18. However, with the possibility of another episode, it could well end on June 25.

For now, there is no official confirmation of when season 3 is scheduled to end. Once it’s made clear, this post will be updated accordingly.
